ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They truly were among Our slaves who are muminun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are among Our faithful devotees.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely both of them were among Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They were two of Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed they are two of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, they were two of Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely they were both of Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: they were among Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! they are two of Our believing slaves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: truly they were among Our faithful servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the twain were of Our bondmen believing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They are indeed among Our faithful servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For they were two of our believing Servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! They were two of Our believing slaves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They were among Our believing worshipers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They were of Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, they were of Our believing servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:122] Indeed both were among Our faithful servants.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! they are two of our believing slaves) who are true in their faith.
